mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.filename AS "filename", a.filesize AS "filesize", a.filepath AS "filepath", a.schunk AS "schunk", a.schunks AS "schunks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.upload_by AS "uploadBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectId AS "project.id", p.name AS "project.name"
LEFT JOIN t_project p ON p.id = a.projectId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_uploadfile( id, filename, filesize, schunk, schunks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, projectId, upload_by, filepath ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{schunk}, #{schunks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{project.id}, #{uploadBy.id}, #{filepath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_uploadfile SET filename = #{filename}, filesize = #{filesize}, schunk = #{schunk}, schunks = #{schunks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, projectId = #{project.id}, upload_by = #{uploadBy.id}, filepath = #{filepath} WHERE id = #{id}
